title: The View: Whoopi Goldberg Nearly Escapes ‘Attack’ by ‘UFO’
description: Whoopi Goldberg downplayed the capabilities of a UFO, which resulted in an attack on her by the flying saucer. However, the 70-year-old actor-comedian refused to back down and ultimately earned her revenge on the alien object. The entire incident took place during the December 4 episode of the renowned talk show The View. title: Elvis claimed he once saw a UFO and here's the other celebs who have too

title: Rubio defends UFO film remarks
description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio is standing by statements he made several years ago, questioning whether unidentified flying objects may be otherworldly visitors.
